title: LYANER Women's Square Neck Lantern Long Sleeve Ruffle Shirred Flowy Party Mini Dress
description: Fabric: Made of soft high quality fabric. Easy to put on and take off，keep you nice and comfortable all day.
Features: square neck, shirred bust, ruffle swing,lantern long sleeve, elegant design, flowy mini dress.
Match: This lantern long sleeve dress can be worn alone or paired with a hat, high heels, wedges, earrings, necklaces, and jewelry to make you more attractive.
Occasions: This shirred bust and ruffle hem mini dress is perfect for dating, wedding, brithday, cocktail, party, club, dinner, night out, beach, vacation, holiday, and daily wear.
